HERO.HEADING: Find Trusted Services Near You
HERO.DESCRIPTION: Connect with skilled professionals for plumbing, electrical, AC repair, and more – all in one place.

WHY_CHOOSE_US.HEADING: Why Choose Us?
WHY_CHOOSE_US.SUBHEADING: Built for your convenience, powered by trust.
WHY_CHOOSE_US.DESCRIPTION: Experience the best in service, safety, and simplicity with Service Seek & Solve.

SECURE.TITLE: Secure Payments
SECURE.DESC: Payments are encrypted and processed through trusted gateways like Easypaisa and JazzCash.

VERIFIED.TITLE: Verified Providers
VERIFIED.DESC: All professionals undergo ID verification and background checks for your peace of mind.

LOCAL.TITLE: Local & Fast
LOCAL.DESC: We show nearby professionals in real-time — so you get help when and where you need it.

SUPPORT.TITLE: 24/7 Support
SUPPORT.DESC: Our team is always here to help you — anytime, any day.

MULTILINGUAL.TITLE: Multilingual Support
MULTILINGUAL.DESC: Easily translate content into Urdu or English for better understanding.

REVIEWS.TITLE: Customer Reviews
REVIEWS.DESC: See honest feedback and ratings from others before hiring a service provider.

TEAM.TITLE: Meet Our Team
TEAM.DESCRIPTION: We're a platform—not a service provider or seeker—run by passionate individuals who connect trusted professionals with people who need them.

SUNNY.DESC: Leading vision and growth, ensuring our platform connects the right people smoothly.

ADNAN.DESC: Handles team coordination, listings, and daily workflow to keep things running efficiently.

USMAN.DESC: Manages development, backend services, and keeps the platform scalable and fast.

TITLE: Trusted Home & Office Services
DESCRIPTION: Book skilled professionals at your convenience. We deliver reliable, affordable, and verified services for all your needs.
PLUMBING_DESC: Leak fixes, pipe installations, and complete bathroom/kitchen plumbing solutions.
ELECTRICIAN_DESC: Expert electrical repairs, rewiring, fuse replacement, and troubleshooting.
AC_TECHNICIAN_DESC: Installation, gas refilling, maintenance, and full AC repair services.
CLEANING_DESC: Deep cleaning for homes and offices with eco-friendly solutions and trained staff.
PAINTER_DESC: Interior & exterior painting with clean finish, color consultancy & material support.
CARPENTER_DESC: Furniture repair, fittings, doors, cupboards, and modular furniture assembly.
HOW_IT_WORKS_DESC: Just 3 simple steps to get started with Service Seek & Solve
STEP_1_DESC: Register as a service seeker or provider to get started.
STEP_2_DESC: Search and view available service providers near your location.
STEP_3_DESC: Book a service provider and let them handle the rest.
WHY_CHOOSE_US_DESC: Experience the best service, safety, and ease with Service Seek & Solve
FEATURE_1_DESC: All transactions are protected and hassle-free with our trusted payment gateway.
FEATURE_2_DESC: All service providers are fully vetted, ensuring quality and trust.
FEATURE_3_DESC: Find service providers near you for faster and more convenient help.
CTA_DESC: Join thousands of satisfied users who have found reliable services with Service Seek & Solve.
DISCOVER_LINE: Discover your skills, serve your community, and turn your efforts into impact.

VALIDATION.PHONE_PATTERN: Phone must start with +92 and be 13 digits (e.g., +923001234567).
